article.title: L-3 Receives Contract for Small Unmanned Aerial Systems Research and Evaluation
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force is awarding an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract to L-3 Communications Corporation for a maximum of $49,750,000. This action will provide for small unmanned aerial systems research and evaluation program to provide maximum flexibility for research and evaluation for the small unmanned serial system.
